TransferPolicy is necessary because the ChipRegistry does not support transferTokenWithChip so that transferToken cannot be overridden.","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"OpenTransferPolicy","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"authorizeTransfer(address,address,address,bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"This function enforces no additional checks and allows the transfer to proceed for parity with transferTokenWithChip function in PBT standard."}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/token/transfer-policies/OpenTransferPolicy.sol":"OpenTransferPolicy"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/interfaces/ITransferPolicy.sol":{"keccak256":"0x12e1725af174b47cb93e46827665f9a0e29cc13a44870ae50cf191518cf5094b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://732023de07ee7520e7f8ccceba6ae5c27e51b013933619e23b5a5c5fea2a18d8","dweb:/ipfs/QmVYdVtoRu1siZAmr9XM7nRT4QvZUk63w8wGyEgaLcypko"]},"contracts/token/transfer-policies/OpenTransferPolicy.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcc0491acaf98a6596133937aa1227d135ec594f98637e042c3cb4fed055d23c4","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f36bbd36be92bc049d935edeb1291ba2287d8a65b940377f9b846c07ba1e2888","dweb:/ipfs/QmdQN1VymAdqDUeBBVYYdWmiS9M4Msa3ZV9FPDVLktuYYe"]}},"version":1}
